name: Liasis
body:
## Introduction
Liasis is a Python IDE for Mac. Written in Cocoa, it feels right at home with your other Mac apps, while providing the tools you need for efficient Python development.

## Features
### Code editor
* Code minimap
* Tabbed file organization
* Syntax highlighting
* Automatic formatting

### Built-in interpreter
* Execute Python code directly within Liasis

## Installation
Liasis requires Mac 10.7 and higher. After downloading the repository, open the Xcode project file and build 

## Future plans
Liasis is under active development. We plan to introduce the following features:
* File browser
* Projects
* Split views and saved workspaces
* Code linting
* Project documentation

## Authors and Contributors
Jason Lomnitz (@jlomnitz) and Danny Nicklas (@dnicklas)
